tags.description: P.O. Box 656
tags.name: Youth Harvest Foundation Ghana
Adakura Primary and Junior High School
Our Lady of Lourdes Basic Schools

tags.description: A Day School with hostel for girls situated at Nabango in the Kasena-Nankana West District in the Upper East Region of Ghana.
tags.name: Nabango Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: The school was established in 2009 as a Community Day School and was absorbed into public system in 2010. It later gained a boarding status in December 2016.
tags.name: Zorkor Senior High School

tags.description: The structures of Bolgatanga Technical Institute were started originally for a West African Secretarial College but later converted into a Technical Institute.
tags.name: Bolgatanga Technical Institute

tags.description: The school was established in 1991 as a community day school. It became a boarding school later in 2002/2003 academic year.
tags.name: Gowrie Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: The school started as middle school with boarding facilities, and later became a vocational school and now a senior high school. It is located 5km away from Bolga town, on the Bolga-Bawku Road.
tags.name: Zuarungu Senior High School

tags.description: Zamse SHTS started on the 27th september, 1976 as Bolgtanga Junior Secondary School. It was later upgraded tp Zamse SHTS on 10th october 1979.
tags.name: Zamse Senior High/Technical School
Ghana India Kofi Annan ICT Centre of Excellence

tags.description: The School started as a Girls’ Middle Boarding in 1956. In 1965, it was transformed into a Women’s Training College and in 1973, Bolgatanga Girls, Senior High School was born.
tags.name: Bolgatanga Girls Senior High School

tags.description: The School was established in 1960 as one of the Ghana Education Trust Schools and is located along the Navrongo-Kologo road.
tags.name: Navrongo Senior High School

tags.description: Gambigo Community Day Senior High School is one of the newly absorbed government Community Day Schools. It started in 2018.
tags.name: Gambigo Community Day Senior High School

tags.description: The school was established in 1954 as a middle boarding school. It later on became a Junior high school in 1978 and a senior high school on 1st January, 1992.
tags.name: Awe Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: Azeem-Namoa Senior High/Technical school is a community Senior High School located in Namoa in the Bongo District of the Upper East Region.
tags.name: Azeem-Namoa Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: To produce disciplined graduates equipped with the requisite skills, attitudes and values that will empower them to contribute positively to the development of their community and the nation as a whole.
tags.name: Bolga-Sherigu Community Senior High School

tags.description: The school was established in September 1991 by the PNDC as a day school. The school later became a boarding school and it is about 400 meters away from the office of the District Assembly.
tags.name: Bongo Senior High School

tags.description: To create an enabling environment that makes Mirigu Senior High a cente of attraction for the delivery of cutting-edge education, and high quality teaching and learning.
tags.name: Mirigu Senior High School

tags.description: The school was established in 1960 by the White Catholic Missionaries as a minor Seminary to train people for the major Seminary. It was originally private but later became government assisted in 1996.
tags.name: Notre Dame Seminary/Senior High School

tags.description: The School started as a middle school, with boarding for girls in 1958, but was later changed into a Secondary/Technical in 1992. Bishop Lucas, the then headmaster at that time reverted the school to a girls’ Senior High School
tags.name: Our Lady of Lourdes Girls' Senior High School

tags.description: Paga Day Senior High School is located at Navio in Paga District. It is about 6km east of Paga.
tags.name: Paga Senior High School

tags.description: Sirgu SHS was established in 2000 by the Sirigu community and later absorbed by government in 2005. The motto for SISEC is Star of Hope.
tags.name: Sirigu Senior High School

tags.description: To train highly proficient technical and vocational graduate with sound morals for self or formal employment using effective and sustainable approaches.
tags.name: St. Bernadette's Technical Institute

tags.description: The school is the vision of the late Monsignor Joseph Apuri in 1990, brought to realisation in 2006 by the late Bishop Lucas Abdamloora to integrate the disabled and the mainstream youth for the realisation of their vocation in life and service to society
tags.name: St. John’s Integrated Senior High/Technical School (Special)

tags.description: Tongo Senior High Technical is one of the most vibrate and well disciplined institution located at the heart of Baare, a suburb of Tongo and about 2km from Tongo Hospital.
tags.name: Tongo Senior High/Technical School
